item.description:
Cloudy and 40s on Saturday - time for that brisk hike at Crane's Beach! Join us for a 2-3 hour walk on this wonderful barrier beach and its dunes. Lunch afterwards is an option too. 

 

Limiting the number of attendees to 12. Dogs on leash on beach only, but they are not allowed in the dunes. 

 

It costs to park here - $5 for non members (I need to check that) - bit less for TTOR members. If you are interested in carpooling, post that on your reply with place you are coming from so people can see it and offer/accept rides etc. $1 meetup fee.
item.how_to_find_us: Parking lot - Red Subaru with kayak holders on top

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Crane Beach Walk and lunch afterwards
